text:
, born Masahiko Kato (加藤雅彦 "Katō Masahiko", January 2, 1940—August 4, 2018) was a Japanese actor and director. Tsugawa was born in Kyoto, Japan. He was known for his roles in "Otoko wa Tsurai yo", ', and "Tampopo".
Death.
Tsugawa died from heart failure on August 4, 2018 in Kyoto at the age of 78.
